title: PBE 500 Error
body: So i got access to pbe sign up and everytime when i go on link it says "500 error Somethingâ€™s gone hextechnically wrong." I dont know what to do now. I was so happy when i saw "You got access for PBE" and then i couldnt make an acc :( Any help?

replies.body: Make sure that you're accessing the PBE page through your own region, in this case EUW.  Log out first completely then login through the [EUW region](http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en), and try again.  You might also have to try another browser in casing an extension or cache issue is getting in the way.  I hope that helps!
